sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {Container, Row, Col,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { PageBreadcrumb } from '../../components/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb' import tickets from '../../assets/data/dummy_ticket.json' import { Messagehistory } from '../../components/Messagehistory/messagehistory'; import { UpdateTicket } from '../../components/Updateticket/updateticket'; const ticket = tickets[0]; export const Ticket =()=>{ const [message, setmessage] = useState('') useEffect(()=>{}, [message]); const handleOnChange =(e)=>{ setmessage(e.target.value) } return(
Subject: {ticket.subjects}
IssueDate: {ticket.addedAt}
Status: {ticket.status}
) }
